Episodes.Title: Baby Ben
Episodes.Plot: Tig is looking forward to baby Ben coming for the day but Ben soon becomes more important than Tig.

Episodes.Title: The Funfair
Episodes.Plot: Tig and Angel go to the fun fair. Tig finds all the noises overwhelming and frightening and wants to go home. Woolly helps Tig to conquer her fear of the funfair by finding out where all the different noises are coming from.

Episodes.Title: The Dance Class
Episodes.Plot: When Tig goes to her first dancing class she doesn't join in because the dancing teacher shouts. Woolly persuades Tig to join in by explaining that the teacher isn't shouting at her, but shouting to be heard above the music.

Episodes.Title: Hair Wash Day
Episodes.Plot: Tig is playing hide and seek with Dad before bath time. When she hears it is hair wash day, she doesn't want to be found as she hates having her hair washed. Woolly gives Tig a few tips on how to make hair wash day bearable.

Episodes.Title: Losing Things
Episodes.Plot: One cold day Tig visits the botanic glass house with her mum and dad. Tig is very upset when on her way home she discovers she has lost her scarf, hat and gloves. Woolly helps Tig to find what she has lost.

Episodes.Title: First Day
Episodes.Plot: Tig and her toy spider Woolly explore new experiences. Woolly tells Tig how to help a little boy on his first day at nursery school.

Episodes.Title: The Clown
Episodes.Plot: When Tig goes shopping with her mum she sees a clown. The clown frightens her. Woolly explains that the clown is just a man with a painted face. He suggests Tig goes and have her face painted like a clown too.

Episodes.Title: Eating New Foods
Episodes.Plot: When Tig visits a restaurant, she is put off eating a new dish when she tastes an olive. Woolly encourages Tig to try the dish again.

Episodes.Title: Open Wide
Episodes.Plot: Tig visits the dentist to have her teeth counted but when she sits in the dentist's chair, she refuses to open her mouth.

Episodes.Title: Timmy's Monsters
Episodes.Plot: When Timmy comes to play he shows Tig how to draw monsters. Tig loves the drawings and puts them under her bed. At night the monsters roar and wake her up. Woolly suggests changing the monsters into daytime monsters.

Episodes.Title: One Step at a Time
Episodes.Plot: When Tig and her dad are confronted by a big cow, Tig is frightened. Woolly helps Tig overcome her fear.

Episodes.Title: Fire Alarm
Episodes.Plot: Woolly helps Tig overcome her fear of a fire alarm at her nursery school.

Episodes.Title: Swing Park
Episodes.Plot: When Tig goes to the swing park with her dad, she sees her friend Angel playing with some children she doesn't know. Woolly gives Tig the confidence to go over and play with Angel and the new friends.

Episodes.Title: The Beard
Episodes.Plot: Live action children's show. Woolly helps Tig overcome her fear of a man with a beard that she finds rather strange.

Episodes.Title: Changing My Room
Episodes.Plot: Live action children's show. Dad dismantles Tig's old cot to lend to a new baby, but Tig is not happy that her room is being changed.

Episodes.Title: Museum of Imagination
Episodes.Plot: Tig's friend Timmy has a great imagination and makes the visit to the museum a little too exciting.

Episodes.Title: Sharing
Episodes.Plot: When Tig's friend Angel comes to play, Tig doesn't like Angel playing with her toys. Woolly shows how sharing can be fun.

Episodes.Title: The Party
Episodes.Plot: Tig gets fed up at a party because she doesn't win a game. Woolly tells Tig that it isn't all about winning - it is about having fun playing.

Episodes.Title: The Painting Day
Episodes.Plot: Tig is at a painting day and refuses to go to the large public toilets. Woolly helps Tig overcome her fear of the toilets.

Episodes.Title: Granny No No
Episodes.Plot: Tig thinks her granny is always saying no to her. Woolly helps Tig to see the positives in her granny.

Episodes.Title: The Bus Ride
Episodes.Plot: Woolly helps Tig to be more considerate when they go home on the bus.

Episodes.Title: Hospital
Episodes.Plot: When Tig's dad goes to hospital, Tig refuses to to see him. Woolly helps Tig understand about hospitals and patients.

Episodes.Title: Choosing
Episodes.Plot: Tig and her mum go shopping for new clothes. Tig can't decide between red shoes and blue shoes. Woolly helps her choose.

Episodes.Title: Big Stomps
Episodes.Plot: Tig goes on holiday. At the holiday camp everyone else is just that little bit older than Tig. Tig is frustrated that she can't do all the things that her friends can do. Woolly encourages Tig to focus on all the things she can do.

Episodes.Title: Splash
Episodes.Plot: Tig hates all the splashing at the swimming pool. Woolly helps Tig to enjoy the water and the splashing too.

Episodes.Title: Busy
Episodes.Plot: Tig's mum and dad are having a very busy day. Tig can't understand why they won't pay her any attention.

Episodes.Title: Supermarket
Episodes.Plot: Tig loses her mum in a supermarket and thinks she has been abandoned. Woolly helps Tig find her mum again.

Episodes.Title: Hair Cut
Episodes.Plot: Tig's hair is getting longer and longer but she refuses to have her hair cut.

Episodes.Title: The Dog
Episodes.Plot: When Tig's granny has a new dog, Woolly helps Tig understand about animals.

Episodes.Title: Sleepover
Episodes.Plot: Tig goes to stay the night with her friend Angel. At night she finds herself all alone with everyone else asleep.
